Html:
Hi.

I was wondering if there is a way to edit the XML file to have square brackets on reference number in bibliography

I mean instead of: 

1. A.Smith. book. 1992.

 

to have 

[1]. A.Smith. book. 1992.

Thanks

See http://bibword.codeplex.com/releases/view/14646

Note that if you have Word 2010, Microsoft just released SP1 which contains 4 new styles, including one for IEEE which also uses square brackets. I also posted a way to import those style into Word 2007 (http://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/office/forum/office_2007-word/apa-6th-edition-and-mla-7th-edition-in-office-2007/7ec9a800-b406-4a04-b257-c2d7d64f5fc3)
